referenceObject.reference: Castanheira, P. de S., Baptista, R. L. C. & Oliveira, F. S. M. (2022). Five new species of the long-jawed orb-weaving spider genus Tetragnatha (Araneae, Tetragnathidae) in South America, with a key to the species from Argentina and Brazil. Evolutionary Systematics 6(2): 175-210.
